name: Terry and a minute
description:
Goal:
  • Avoid the meteors/ destroy them to live.
  • Reach the end before time reaches zero.
Game Background:
  • An asteroid is falling towards the earth and you have the power to save them, you only have a minute before the asteroid collides completely, do you have what it takes?
Mechanics: 
  • Z to Jump/ Double Jump
  • X to Dash (destroys collided meteors)
  • Left and Right Arrow key to rotate
  • Down Arrow Key to go down faster
  • Bonus. There is no pause button.
Features:
  • Has a minute snowboarding course.
  • a short story :D
  • Random Spawned Meteors :D

Credits:
